ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah they aren t I did them today. My pet stills loses a lot more hp verse giants. I think it s because of the way npcs work and the way pcs work which is to
ygData.messageBody:
Nah they aren't I did them today. My pet stills loses a lot more hp verse
giants. I think it's because of the way npcs work and the way pcs work which
is to say very diffrent. My pet can solo a sea fury but gets the crap beaten
out of him by gornit. Again it's probably the way pc's verse npcs work and
npc's verse npc's.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 28, 2000 2:01 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> did. As for the sea furies ask somebody who was hunting there early on
they
>> arte just cyclops with a upgrade in level and hp. They forgot to raise
the
>> ac and attack rating. That's why when I go after gornit my pet loses a
ton
>> more hp.
>
>Well, I assure you that as of 3 months ago they are fixed now
>and much much harder than giants. So much so that we decided
>they were too hard for their /con and not worth the
>experience. Gornit was a piece of cake after them.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
